item.description:
Go-Kart Racing at F1 Boston in Braintree (3/20)

 

Let's go race karts at F1 Boston in Braintree. Here's a description:

 

 

F1 Boston offers the ultimate indoor kart racing experience, from Arrive & Drive open racing sessions. Their two European-style tracks offer plenty of racing thrills – sharp turns, a corkscrew and tunnel. You'll come in and suit up, receive a driver briefing, and pit yourself against other drivers scored by their computerized, split-second timing system.

 

You do need to have a valid a driver's license to race. They will provide suits and helmets.

 

The price is normally $38 for a day, but they have a coupon to get 50% off so that will be $19 to race. Anyone can use the coupon. We just have to print one out and hand it to the registration folks: http://www.push44.com/yur64d1i

 

 

 

*Updated Information from Alex*

 

Coupon: The 50% off coupon discounts the day license ($10) and one race only ($28) so it will be $19 discounted price. The coupon can only be used for Arrive & Drive (I will explain further below). Each print-out of the coupon can only be used for one race and it is limited to one per customer. Subsequent races will cost the full price of $28.

Race Time: Each race covers 15 laps, which will last about 10 minutes.

Arrive & Drive vs. Pre-Booking Track Time: Anyone can go to F1 Boston to arrive and drive. This means that it is a first-come-first-serve basis. Sometimes F1 Boston may have corporate or private events that would block off a track for a few hours. F1 Boston recommends that we check on the status of the track a few days before. I will call between Wednesday and Friday of next week to make sure there is no event blocking the track. I will send out an update email about this.

Assuming there are no events blocking the track, each of us can pre-book for our own spot using a credit card on Friday 3/18. By doing this, you don’t have to wait in line; just come in, fill out a waiver form, and be ready to race. Pre-booking requires that you pre-pay the full $38 price, but you will get reimbursed for the half price.

Given the number of people RVSP right now, I will leave it to you to pre-book your own spots (please do so by Friday 3/18). If you would like me to pre-book for you, please send me an email for more details and I will take care of the pre-booking. You would need to send the full $38 via paypal by Thursday 3/18 at the latest to pre-book for you.

 

If you have any questions, don’t hesitate to email me. I would be happy to answer questions that you have.

 

 

 

Check out their site for more information and rules: http://www.f1boston.com

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group
